dialogue.describe: If you see this, it's a bug!
dialogue.offer: Seeing this is probably also a bug.
dialogue.accepted: And seeing this is probably a bug too.
dialogue.rejected: Oi, cease with these shenanigans, ye debuggers!
dialogue.advice: In fact most of this dialogue is a bug if you run into it, as this mission is started purely through dialogue.
dialogue.success: Good.  I hope that it wasn't too harrowing an experience, but we're dealing with some extremely dangerous threats, and it's only going to get worse from there.  Come see me when you're ready, I've got more important tasks that need taking care of.
dialogue.success_lie: Somehow I doubt that… in fact seeing this is probably another bug, given you can't really bluff your way out of this mission.
dialogue.failure: Pretty certain seeing this is a bug too, since you'd have to die to fail this.

dialogue.describe: If you see this, it's a bug!
dialogue.offer: You seem like a capable person, so you might have a chance.  We have pieced together the coordinates to the laboratory Apophis uses as its base.  I want you to take it down, rid the world of Apophis!  That lab has a lot of valuable equipment left inside; if you manage to kill that thing, it's all yours.  I wish we could do it ourselves, but between the portal breakthroughs, the bombs and the undead, the chance has been lost.
dialogue.accepted: You're sure about this?  Thank you… that means a lot, you know.  Be sure to bring some proof, be creative.  I'll be waiting for your return.  I'd suggest talking to Sigma and Lambda too, before you leave.
dialogue.rejected: I understand.  It's practically a lost cause at this point.  I'll keep trying to figure something out to stop it.
dialogue.advice: Get some decent armor and weapons, this fight won't be easy.  Assemble a team to make it easier.  Ask Lambda and Sigma if they want to join you, if you want.  A single person can't take it on…
dialogue.success: Is that…you did it!  You have no idea what you have done for us!  You are truly a legend among men in these dark times.  You are always welcomed here!
dialogue.success_lie: Oh, no proof huh?.  I hope you are being truthful…
dialogue.failure: At least you are alive.  I should have never told you to do something like that.  I am sorry…

dialogue.describe: If you see this, it's a bug!
dialogue.offer: I'm trying to reach a hideout built by former scientists who worked on the Bio-Weapon project.  I think I have a lead on where they are, but I would appreciate a helping hand.  I had someone with me, but he got caught outside when company showed up.
dialogue.accepted: Thank you.  I'll follow along and maybe we'll get some answers.
dialogue.rejected: Oh.  I'd rather try to find the place with some help, so if you're willing to later on maybe…
dialogue.advice: I was searching this old lab for intel that might help.  Take a look for yourself if you need to.  In addition, the humvee my companion and I arrived in still should be parked outside, assuming those things didn't trash it…
dialogue.inquire: Any closer to the others yet?
dialogue.success: Excellent.  I'll go ahead and stick around for now.  Looks like they have a decent little setup going on here.  Maybe asking around will get us pointed in the right direction.
dialogue.failure: It's all for nothing, isn't it?
